pr_title: Deciders should not by default collect yes'es

timeline.message:
Deciders should not by default collect yes'es

AllocationDeciders would collect Yes decisions when not asking for debug
info. Changed to only include Yes decisions when debug is requested
(explain).

timeline.bodyText: perhaps add a comment explaining this condition. I had to rewrite it in my head to debugMode != ON => type != YES
